title: MS Typography Page Celebrates 10 Years
content:
Three cheers to Simon Daniels who is celebrating his website’s [tenth anniversary](http://web.archive.org/web/20071214200213/http:/www.atypi.org/news_tool/news_rss_html?newsid=354) this week. microsoft.com/typography was created on Feb 27, 1996 and its [news page](http://web.archive.org/web/20071214200213/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/links/default.aspx) is still (and now even more active than ever) the best place on the web to catch the various typographic bits and pieces we’d otherwise miss. As a parttime (and slacking) reporter of type news I know from firsthand experience that keeping the momentum going is a feat, let alone for ten years straight. My hat is off to Simon for his dedication. I am very impressed indeed.

author: Stephen Coles

comments.content: Me too. I think this site is one of the best informational and educational site ever put up on the web. That alone, without it’s outstanding durability in a time when so many sites lag of pass out, makes it all the more of a great thing that Simon has done. Keep up the good!

Like Ebert and Roeper...

Two thumbs way up!
